name: youtube_video_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_video_details.
Tool description: YouTube Video Details API
API description: Fetches detailed information about a YouTube video using the provided video ID or URL.

is_id.description:
**Video ID** or **Video URL**

e.g. `SmM0653YvXU`
e.g. `https://youtu.be/SmM0653YvXU`
e.g. `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SmM0653YvXU`
